body:
Look at hydra examples like [this one](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=THERM_Export_Workflow&slide=0&scale=4.469148552288882&offset=-285.4415386475287,-572.5322843397041) and [this](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=THERM_Comparison_of_Stud_Wall_Constructions&slide=0&scale=8&offset=-1220.6296478747274,-652.554035174092) one (look for the "frame cavity" material).

-A.
